mapper.delete: delete from t_base_menu_role_mapping where MENU_ID = #{menuId} and ROLE_ID = #{roleId}
mapper.select: select ROLE_ID from t_base_menu_role_mapping where MENU_ID = #{menuId}

SELECT t_base_role.ROLE_NAME, t_base_role.ROLE_ID, t_base_role.ROLE_PID, t_base_role.IS_LEAF, t_base_role.SEQU, t_base_role.IS_DEL, t_base_role.CREATE_USERID, t_base_role.CREATE_TIME, t_base_role.UPDATE_USERID, t_base_role.UPDATE_TIME FROM t_base_role LEFT JOIN t_base_menu_role_mapping ON t_base_menu_role_mapping.ROLE_ID = t_base_role.ROLE_ID WHERE t_base_menu_role_mapping.MENU_ID = #{menuId}

SELECT t_base_menu.MENU_ID, t_base_menu.MENU_NAME, t_base_menu.ICON_CSS, t_base_menu.URL, t_base_menu.MENU_PID, t_base_menu.SEQU FROM t_base_menu LEFT JOIN t_base_menu_role_mapping ON t_base_menu_role_mapping.MENU_ID = t_base_menu.MENU_ID WHERE t_base_menu_role_mapping.ROLE_ID = #{roleId} order by t_base_menu.SEQU
